      • indexFastaFile

        public static void indexFastaFile(java.lang.String fastaFileName,
                  java.lang.String samtoolsExecutable,
                  Scheduler scheduler,
                  org.ggf.drmaa.Session drmaaSession)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException
        Index a fasta file using samtools faidx and write bsub output file to working directory
        Parameters:
        fastaFileName - The fasta file to index
        samtoolsExecutable - Path to samtools executable
        scheduler - Scheduler
        drmaaSession - Active DRMAA session. Pass null if not using OGS. There should only be one active session at a time. Session should have been created in the main method of the class calling this method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException

      • indexFastaFile

        public static void indexFastaFile(java.lang.String fastaFileName,
                  java.lang.String samtoolsExecutable,
                  java.lang.String bsubOutDir,
                  Scheduler scheduler,
                  org.ggf.drmaa.Session drmaaSession)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException
        Index a fasta file using samtools faidx
        Parameters:
        fastaFileName - The fasta file to index
        samtoolsExecutable - Path to samtools executable
        bsubOutDir - Directory to write bsub output to
        scheduler - Scheduler
        drmaaSession - Active DRMAA session. Pass null if not using OGS. There should only be one active session at a time. Session should have been created in the main method of the class calling this method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException
